articles.content: Stray Kids ring up their second No. 1 album on the Billboard 200 — and second of 2022 — as MAXIDENT debuts atop the list (dated Oct. 22). The eight track set bows with 117,000 equivalent album units … [+8899 chars]

articles.author: Josh Halliday
articles.title: Joyce Sims, R&B singer-songwriter, dies aged 63 - The Guardian
articles.description: Sims shot to fame in the late-1980s when her single Come Into My Life reached the top 10 in the US and the UK
articles.content:
Tributes have been paid to the R&B singer-songwriter Joyce Sims, who has died at the age of 63.
Sims shot to fame in the late 1980s when her single Come Into My Life reached the top 10 in the US… [+3980 chars]

articles.title: Ulta Beauty defends transgender influencer against harmful criticism - Insider
articles.description: Ulta Beauty's latest podcast episode features influencer Dylan Mulvaney and host David Lopez discussing femininity and beauty.
articles.content:
Ulta Beauty has responded to anti-trans people who are criticizing and boycotting the retailer for featuring a transgender influencer in a recent video.
